trans-unit.source: Specifies how a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control behaves when the control resizes.
This enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> property specifies how a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> is autosized on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
The width of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> is determined by its contents.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> does not change size when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control resizes.

The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> shares the available space on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> (the space not taken up by other panels whose <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize"></xref> property is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize.None"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize.Contents"></xref>) with other panels that have their <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize"></xref> property set to <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize.Spring"></xref>.
